message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to let it go for $180.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer.  I'm interested but $180 is a bit more than I'm willing to spend right now. Would you consider $140?
Hi Bob, thanks for your offer. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I'm still a bit higher than your offer. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $160.
Alice, I appreciate you meeting me halfway, but $160 is still a little too high for me. I'm happy to go up to $150, but that's my final offer.
Hi Bob, I understand you're trying to get a good deal, but I really need to make a profit on this one. I'm willing to compromise, but I'm not going to go below $155. That's my final offer.
